sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentences.cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: Details are available from the Hon. Sec. A.R. Bushby.
sentences.cn: 详情可咨询名誉秘书A.R.布什比。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: He’s a really nice man.
sentences.cn: 他真是个好人。

sentences.en: I get paid once a month.
sentences.cn: 我的工资一个月发一次。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I want to train to be an engineer.
sentences.cn: 我想经过培训成为一名工程师。

sentences.en: I was assigned to Troop A of the 10th Cavalry.
sentences.cn: 我被派往第10骑兵队的A连。

sentences.en: It needs a good clean.
sentences.cn: 这得好好清洗一下。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: Suddenly they heard a loud bang.
sentences.cn: 他们突然听到砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: Take a look at this.
sentences.cn: 瞧瞧这个。

sentences.en: The Koran recommends fasting as a penance before pilgrimages.
sentences.cn: 《古兰经》劝告人们在朝圣前斋戒，以作为一种补赎。

sentences.en: There was a hole in the fence.
sentences.cn: 篱笆上有一个洞。

sentences.en: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

sentences.en: We have a problem.
sentences.cn: 我们遇到了一个麻烦。

sentences.en: Would you like a sandwich?
sentences.cn: 来块三明治好吗？

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

trans.tran_en: used to show that you are talking about someone or something that has not been mentioned before, or that your listener does not know about

trans.tran_cn: 一，一个〔用于未曾提及或对方不知道的人或物的名称前〕
trans.tran_en: used to show that you are talking about someone or something that has not been mentioned before, or that your listener does not know about

trans.tran_cn: 字母A；第一流的；学业成绩达最高标准的评价符号
trans.tran_en: used to show that you are referring to a general type of person or thing and not a specific person or thing
